chargeHist.descr: Battery or Threat to Judge, Prosecutor, or Law Enforcement Officer

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Activity: Arraignment  
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

09:18 AM Defendant Luther Lee Hughes in court in custody by video from the Rock County Jail with attorney Melissa Anne Frost by video.  Kyle Edward Johnson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendants Attorney pleads not guilty and jury trial to be set.

Activity: Preliminary Hearing  
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

10:14 AM Defendant Luther Lee Hughes in court in custody by video from the Rock County Jail with attorney Melissa Anne Frost by video.  Kyle Edward Johnson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Officer Alexander Limberg sworn in and testified by video. Court takes judicial notice of 20CF327, 20CF326 and 20CF192. Witness identified Defendant. State moves for bind over, defense objects without argument.  Court finds probable cause and binds Defendant over for filing of an Information. Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived. Arraignment scheduled for April 25, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Preliminary hearing on April 18, 2022 at 09:45 am.

Activity:  Adjourned initial appearance  
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

Activity:  Adjourned initial appearance  
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

03:12 PM Defendant Luther Lee Hughes in court in custody by video from the Rock County Jail with attorney Melissa Anne Frost by video.  David S Olson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Preliminary Hearing requested by zoom. Bond continued. Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 18, 2022 at 09:45 am.

Activity: Initial appearance
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

3:20 PM Defendant Luther Lee Hughes in court in custody at the Rock County Jail by video with attorney Jason Sanders by video for attorney Melissa Anne Frost. Kyle Edward Johnson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.   Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Cash bond set of $500.00 with conditions. Matter continued for attorney Frost to appear, may re argue bond.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 5, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
